articles.title: Wisconsin opens at No. 21 in the USA Today coaches football poll - Milwaukee Journal Sentinel
articles.description: Wisconsin finished the 2022 football season unranked after finishing 7-6. Luke Fickell's first UW team opened at No. 21 in the USA Today poll.
articles.content:
MADISON Wisconsin finished the 2022 college football season unranked.
